Portal 2D

Description

In Portal 2D, your goal is to get to the end of the level by using the Portal Gun.

The Portal Gun will allow you to shoot portals, which you can teleport between. Portals can only be placed on purple cubes.

You also must navigate through dangerous, lava-ridden obstacles, aided by moving blocks.

User Guide

Player Movement--

WASD or arrow keys to move.

Making a Portal--

Aim at purple block with mouse and
press 'Q' to make a blue portal, or
press 'E' to make an orange portal.

Teleporting Through Portals--

Walk into a portal and press T.

Press 'R' to restart if you're stuck or dead.

What I learned

In this unit, I learned a multitude of coding languages including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I learned how to create an organized website in HTML, style it in CSS, and even create games with JavaScript. In each of these tasks, I learned how do to do specific things. In HTML, I learned how to start making the content of a website, manage and use divs, sections, and classes. This allowed me to create more complex and interesting website designs, far easier. I also learned how to style this website in CSS. I learned how to edit colors, borders, and even text settings. Finally, I learned many concepts related to game design in JavaScript. I learned how to create and use sprites, variables, and even visual art in this unit. I was able to incorporate all of this into a game, with cohesive controls, and some challenge as well. In conclusion, I learned how to use many coding languages throughout the course of this unit. I learned how to create a website with HTML and CSS, and create a game with JavaScript.
